comments:
STEPS:
1. start EPF M4-N20060718 with 7.0.1 lib
2. create a new cp with a new config
3. create an activity in the cp
4. extend that activity with an activity in 7.0.1 and save
5. reload lib
results=> the log is showing the following exception

Created an attachment (id=46533)
error reloading lib

The steps are actually simpler.
1. open 7.0.1 lib
2. after the migration, reload the lib
The logs will show the exceptions
Jeff, can you please look into this. Null pointer condition in marker listener code in LibraryView

Created an attachment (id=46547)
patch for fix

check for nulls in the IResourceChangeListener.  While loading a library, the EditingDomain and ResourceSet may not be yet initialized.
closed it as verified by QA.
